title: Chemistry Education and Teacher Professional Development Workshop Using the VisChem Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary chemistry concepts and foundational knowledge of pedagogical methodologies
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen chemistry concept visualization competencies aligned with NGSS standards, emphasizing particle-level explanations and molecular process interpretation skills.

learning_goals: Participants can visualize and explain chemical phenomena at the particle level using the VisChem approach.
Participants enhance their ability to design chemistry concept teaching and learning aligned with NGSS standards.
Participants can clearly distinguish and explain the relationship between molecular-level species characteristics and chemical processes.

resources: Online Collaboration Platforms (ZOOM, Google Classroom, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
